item.description:
Lets celebrate Spring and all the great Food it has to offer, Fresh,Delicious,Healthy we can even plant our own :-) bring the kids or even the grand kids :-)

Seedling Sale & Farm Festival (Sat, May 22, 10:00 – 3:00)
Enjoy Common Ground’s annual ORGANIC SEEDLING SALE and SPRING FARM FESTIVAL! The organic seedling sale features strong, healthy seedlings for your home garden. Choose from heirloom and hybrid varieties of tomatoes, hot and sweet peppers, broccoli, kale, parsley, basil, cucumbers, eggplant, and more. Seedlings priced from $1.00 - $4.00. At the Farm Festival, celebrate community and the beginning of the growing season as you enjoy tractor-pulled hayrides, music, face-painting, ice cream making, games, visits to the animals, live sheep shearing, and our 4th annual school-wide tag sale and bake sale. Admission to all events is FREE!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be near the entrance with a meetup sign at 10 am

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "COME ONE AND ALL "Farmers Market and Seedling Festival
